mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENTRY_SEL_INTRO(RCRT_NO, ITEM_NAME, MAX_CHAR, ITEM_EXPL) VALUES(#{rcrtNo}, #{itemName}, #{maxChar}, #{itemExpl})
INSERT INTO entry_apply_intro(item_no, aply_no, rcrt_no, answer) VALUES (#{itemNo}, #{aplyNo}, #{rcrtNo}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT ESI.RCRT_NO, ESI.ITEM_NAME, ESI.ITEM_EXPL,ESI.ITEM_NO, ESI.MAX_CHAR, EAI.ANSWER FROM entry_sel_intro AS ESI LEFT OUTER JOIN entry_apply_intro AS EAI ON ESI.rcrt_no = EAI.rcrt_no AND ESI.ITEM_NO = EAI.ITEM_NO WHERE aply_no = #{aplyNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE entry_apply_intro SET answer = #{answer} WHERE aply_no=#{aplyNo} AND rcrt_no=#{rcrtNo} AND item_no=#{itemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM entry_apply_intro WHERE aply_no = #{aplyNo} AND rcrt_no = #{rcrtNo});
